scripts.predocker_push: docker build -t docker.io/eidolonai/webui -t docker.io/eidolonai/webui:$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"') .
scripts.docker_push: docker push docker.io/eidolonai/webui:$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"') &&  docker push docker.io/eidolonai/webui:latest
scripts.maybe_docker_push: npm pkg get version | tr -d '"' | grep -q $(docker images docker.io/eidolonai/webui --format '{{.Tag}}') && echo 'Image exists' || npm run docker_push
